title: Client Crashes right after lobby loading screen
body: My champ select runs fine but as soon as the game starts, both my client and laptop freeze so I have to hard reset my laptop and I tried this three times unfortunately cus I wasnt sure whats the issue so LeaverBuster thinks its intentional and I have a 20 minute low priority queue ban now. need help

replies.body: Have you recently updated Windows 10?  There's been an issue with freezing for some players, and it appears to be a problem with the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Disabling this should get you fixed up!

This has also happened to me over and over since the release of patch 6.17
I never had an issue with the game crashing before then, but now when i load in to a game it freezes before all the champions spawn, then everyone redoes the game and I end up losing lp.
